page.title: 19FARMING IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Primrose Farm is owned by Les Stevens. He owns 45 acres.The farm is mixed.The main crops grown are vegetables and cereals.0.25% is pasture,0.25% is cereals and the other half is other crops.He keeps 12-14 horses.He has 4 tractors and 1 combine harvester. Affricks Farm is owned by Michael Passaro.He owns 63 acres of pastoral land,which includes 3 acres of decidious woodland.He keeps 300 sows, 4 tractors,a plough,forage harvester and trailers.Heath Cottage is a small holding,owned by Mr.Wallace he has 4 acres and it is pastoral.He keeps 2 beef cows,20 sheep,40 chickens,1 horse, 5 pigs (and some ducks and a pond). Brimmers Farm is 448 years old,it has 28 acres.The present owners have lived there since 1937.It is an agricultural farm,whose main crop is corn.
